createComment.description: Add comments to a key in your Lokalise project

props.name: comment
props.description: The comment text to add to the key

createKey.description: Create one or more keys in your Lokalise project

props.name: keyName
props.description: The name/identifier for the key (e.g., "index.welcome")

props.name: description
props.description: Optional description for the key

props.name: platforms
props.description: Select the platforms this key applies to

props.name: tags
props.description: Comma-separated tags for the key (e.g., "urgent,ui")

props.name: useAutomations
props.description: Whether to run automations on the new key translations

createProject.description: Create a new project in your Lokalise team

props.name: projectName
props.description: Name of the project

props.name: description
props.description: Description of the project

props.name: projectType
props.description: Type of the project

props.name: baseLangIso
props.description: Language/locale code of the project base language (e.g., "en", "en-us")

props.name: teamId
props.description: ID of the team to create a project in (numerical ID or UUID). If omitted, the project will be created in your current team

props.name: isSegmentationEnabled
props.description: Enable Segmentation feature for project

createTask.description: Create a new task in your Lokalise project

props.name: taskTitle
props.description: Title of the task

props.name: description
props.description: Brief task description. Used as instructions for AI in automatic_translation and lqa_by_ai task types

props.name: taskType
props.description: Type of the task

props.name: keys
props.description: Comma-separated list of key IDs to include in the task (required unless parent_task_id is specified)

props.name: languages
props.description: Comma-separated language ISO codes for the task (e.g., "fr,de,es")

props.name: languageIso
props.description: Language ISO code (e.g., "fr", "de")

props.name: sourceLanguageIso
props.description: Source language code for the task

props.name: dueDate
props.description: Due date in format: Y-m-d H:i:s (e.g., "2024-12-31 23:59:59")

props.name: autoCloseLanguages
props.description: Whether languages should be closed automatically upon completion. Default is true

props.name: autoCloseTask
props.description: Whether the task should be automatically closed upon all language completion. Default is true

props.name: closingTags
props.description: Comma-separated tags to be added to keys when task is closed

props.name: doLockTranslations
props.description: If set to true, will lock translations for non-assigned project members

props.name: markVerified
props.description: Mark translations as verified. Only for automatic_translation tasks. Default is true

props.name: saveAiTranslationToTm
props.description: Save AI translations to Translation Memory. Only for automatic_translation tasks

props.name: applyAiTm100Matches
props.description: Apply 100% translation memory matches. Only for automatic_translation tasks

deleteKey.description: Delete a key from your Lokalise project (software and marketing projects only)

retrieveAComment.description: Retrieve a specific comment on a key in your Lokalise project

props.name: commentId
props.description: Unique identifier of the comment

retrieveAKey.description: Retrieve detailed information about a specific key in your Lokalise project

props.name: disableReferences
props.description: Disable key references in the response

retrieveAProject.description: Retrieve detailed information about a Lokalise project

retrieveTranslation.description: Retrieve a specific translation from your Lokalise project

props.name: translationId
props.description: Unique translation identifier

props.name: disableReferences
props.description: Disable key references in the translation

updateKey.description: Update properties of a key in your Lokalise project

props.name: keyName
props.description: Key identifier (or JSON with ios, android, web, other for per-platform names)

props.name: description
props.description: Description of the key

props.name: platforms
props.description: List of platforms enabled for this key

props.name: tags
props.description: Comma-separated tags for the key

props.name: mergeTags
props.description: Enable to merge specified tags with current tags

props.name: isPlural
props.description: Whether this key is plural

props.name: pluralName
props.description: Optional custom plural name

props.name: isHidden
props.description: Whether this key is hidden from non-admins

props.name: isArchived
props.description: Whether this key is archived

props.name: context
props.description: Optional context of the key (used with some file formats)

props.name: charLimit
props.description: Maximum allowed number of characters in translations

updateTranslation.description: Update a translation in your Lokalise project

props.name: translationId
props.description: Unique translation identifier

props.name: translation
props.description: The actual translation content. Use JSON object format for plural keys

props.name: isUnverified
props.description: Whether the Unverified flag is enabled

props.name: isReviewed
props.description: Whether the Reviewed flag is enabled

props.name: custom_translation_status_ids
props.description: Comma-separated custom translation status IDs to assign (existing statuses will be replaced)

keyAdded.description: Trigger when a new key is added to your Lokalise project

keyUpdated.description: Trigger when a key is updated in your Lokalise project

translationUpdated.description: Trigger when a translation is updated in your Lokalise project
